channel.title: Delete
channel.description: Lol, funny bc it's so damn hard changing colors. Also the log out 1 is completely diff code. 2. Mod delete. Ohh and Baselm likes dick.

item.title: Delete
item.dc:creator: @Jerome123183 Jerome123183
item.description:
@Jerome123183 wrote:

[quote=“baselm, post:7, topic:318852”][quote author=T3arful link=topic=415311.msg3056748#msg3056748 date=1260542913]

Well I’m slowly getting back into p-servers. But just mostly clients. So I’m releasing some stuff I have been doing.

Add to Class9

[code]public static void Sidebar8(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid)
{
Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[5065];
/addText(ID, “Text”, ???, Size, Colour);/
addText(5070, “Add Friend”, wid, 0, 0xff9933);
addText(5071, “Del Friend”, wid, 0, 0xff9933);

	class9.anIntArray241[0] = 2;
	class9.anIntArray241[1] = 53;//friends list - world xxx X
	class9.anIntArray241[4] = 25;//add friend X
	class9.anIntArray241[5] = 106;//del friend X
	class9.anIntArray272[0] = 25;
	class9.anIntArray272[4] = 236;//add friend Y
	class9.anIntArray272[5] = 236;//del friend Y

	class9 = aClass9Array210[5066];

	class9.anInt267 = 194;
	for(int i = 0; i < 400; i++)
	class9.anIntArray272[i] -= 8;

	class9 = aClass9Array210[5067];

	class9.aString248 = "Friends List - World XXX";
	class9.aBoolean223 = true;
	class9.anInt232 = 0xff9933;
}[/code]

Add under aClass44 =

Sidebar8(class30_sub2_sub1_sub4);

Pic(s)

Why do you leech everything from r-s?
This is βeηjαmiη ’s not yours, you even used the same picture and everything l0l
Same with your logout one, it’s all the same.

/showthread.php?t=147070

βeηjαmiη ♥;1277904:

Here is another example from one of my sidebar interfaces.

[CODE] public static void Sidebar10(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid)
{
Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[2449];
class9.anIntArray272[0] = 68;
class9.anIntArray272[1] = 86;
class9.anIntArray241[2] = 12;
class9.anIntArray272[2] = 104;
class9.anIntArray241[8] = 31;
class9.anIntArray272[8] = 164;

	class9 = aClass9Array210[2450];
	class9.anInt232 = 0xff981f;
	
	class9 = aClass9Array210[2451];
	class9.anInt232 = 0xff981f;
	
	class9 = aClass9Array210[2452];
	class9.anInt232 = 0xff981f;
}[/CODE]

That one changed my sidebar from

No, there may not be much difference but thats only an example. You could use the same style I have, to change many things.
I will give you one more example, which I used for changing the friends list around (it was quite complicated to get it perfect).

[CODE] public static void Sidebar8(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid)
{
Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[5065];
/addText(ID, “Text”, ???, Size, Colour);/
addText(5070, “Add Friend”, wid, 0, 0xff9933);
addText(5071, “Del Friend”, wid, 0, 0xff9933);

	class9.anIntArray241[0] = 2;
	class9.anIntArray241[1] = 53;//friends list - world xxx X
	class9.anIntArray241[4] = 25;//add friend X
	class9.anIntArray241[5] = 106;//del friend X
	class9.anIntArray272[0] = 25;
	class9.anIntArray272[4] = 236;//add friend Y
	class9.anIntArray272[5] = 236;//del friend Y

	class9 = aClass9Array210[5066];

	class9.anInt267 = 194;
	for(int i = 0; i < 400; i++)
	class9.anIntArray272[i] -= 8;

	class9 = aClass9Array210[5067];

	class9.aString248 = "Friends List - World XXX";
	class9.aBoolean223 = true;
	class9.anInt232 = 0xff9933;
}[/CODE]

Here’s another picture because I am bored

βeηjαmiη [/QUOTE]

And you say you’re only on moparscape, yet you have the exact same code + pictures off of that thread.
You’re such a lier.

rofl, tonic is a sad god dam fucking leecher[/quote]

lol baselm you ripped out codes from jamiz client and it was posted on r-s

Read full topic
